organizations.name: Planning Commission
quotes: For example, in the Planning Commission, I had to work with the government that was there and that was Mari Alkatiri.

organizations.name: Civil Society Commission
quotes: He created all these boxes, but the boxes were empty. Now, I had to fill up the boxes and come up with ideas of how to do it.

organizations.name: UN
quotes: Of course, in the end the UN was responsible, so I reported to him.
I had to do it for the UN. [I had] to satisfy everybody.

organizations.name: government
quotes: I was supposed to work for the government, but in the end I had to do it for everybody. I had to do it for the government.

quotes: I had to do it for the civil society.
